newsitem.title: USA: Wall Data sees Q3 loss.
newsitem.headline: Wall Data sees Q3 loss.

text.p: Wall Data Inc said on Wednesday it expects to report a loss in the range of $0.06 to $0.11 a share on estimated revenues of between $30 million and $31 million.

The company attributed the lower than expected revenues compared with the immediately preceding quarter primarily to a significant decline in sales of its 16-bit Windows products, particularly in international markets.

The maker of data management software products said sales of its newer 32-bit Windows 95/NT continued to increase worldwide both in absolute dollars and as a percentage of revenues compared with the prior quarter.
Wall Data said in a statement it expects to report results for the quarter, ended September 30, on October 17.
